title: Looking for Plat+ team members for a super super super serious but also fun team :)
body:
Hi I am a plat 5 fill main and my friend a D5 "Filthyminx" ADC main are looking for 3 members in either JG, TOP, SUP or MID. We are aiming to push for diamond in r5 teams. Note that an important part is a willingness to practice in both trying different comps and champs but also willing to be in voice chats to execute those beautiful rotations. Reply here and as soon as we have 5 we will start trialling how well we mesh in normals and over voice comms before we decide upon a set roster.

TY GLHF.

replies.body: Good luck and see you on Summoner's Rift ;)

IGN: Jbails
Roles: Supp / Jg
Rank: plat 5

I'm available during the week mostly and work weekends during the afternoons till night. Am keen though
Hey man, not sure if I can make the cut. I'm gold 1 jungle main but cal play all rolls. IGN Best player

ign: Mosse is ali
rank plat promos atm(got demoted to g1 from inactive. overseas for 4 months.) currently P2 Euw (amazinkille)
Mid,jg,adc either of them are good for me
What was that in ur pm about you trading you acc, that seemed dodge
i prefer gold - plat climb its funner then plat-trying to get to diamond
Hey man, will be keen. Currently plat5, I play top and mid.
Hello, i added you in-client to talk :^)
